conversation.content: I want to find bras that offer comfort and support for all-day wear. within my expected price range: [12.99, 21.43]
I would like to learn more about the Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra. Can you provide me with additional details about its features and materials used?

Based on your budget range, I recommend the Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra. It offers sublimely comfortable support with wirefree cups and adjustable straps. Would you like to consider the potentially purchasable candidate for a similar but enhanced experience? <"Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."]>
Can you please provide me with more details about the features and materials used in the Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra?

Based on your budget range, I recommend the Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra. It offers sublimely comfortable support with wirefree cups and adjustable straps. Would you like to consider the potentially purchasable candidate for a similar but enhanced experience? <"Item Title: <Bali Wireless Bra, Our Bestselling Wirefree Moisture-Wicking Bra, Double Support Satin Full-Coverage Wireless Bra> / Item ID: B09WMP5XDL / Price: $40.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["There's a reason Bali's Double Support® full-coverage wireless bra is one of our bestsellers. It offers superb support in every size without underwires that can poke, pinch, and prod. Signature M-Frame™ construction shapes and separates while providing flexible support. Its smooth t-shirt-ready soft-touch satin is made from our Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry. The seamless, double-layer cups provide full coverage and a sleek look under clingy clothes. More smoothing comes from the built-up sides and back. Plus the Comfortsoft band that encloses the inside elastic is designed to move with you. And Bali's signature Comfort-U® design ensures that the straps and back stay in place."]>
